title: TCP Sliding Window Implementation
description: Developed a client-server application using Java Sockets, implemented the three-way handshake, and improved data transmission efficiency by 50%.

title: Wordle Game
description: Built a Wordle game in React, improved code reusability by creating a dynamic color-changing grid, and collaborated in an Agile team.

title: Flight Management System
description: Led a team to create a full-stack flight management system, enhanced user experience, and increased process efficiency by 30%.

title: Responsive Portfolio Website
description: Built a responsive portfolio using React, JavaScript, and CSS, featuring reusable components, scroll-triggered animations using motion framer, and dynamic styling for a clean, engaging user experience across all devices.
